string.name: SKSetHotkey_Interface

string.name: SKUnsafeHotkey
string.comment: Hotkey Dialog/FormatString: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use [%0:s = Hotkey] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The hotkey %0:s will conflict with normal keyboard use. You should use at least Ctrl or Alt. Do you want to change this now?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Keyboard
string.comment: Hotkey Dialog/FormatString: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another keyboard [%0:s = Hotkey, %1:s = Conflicting keyboard] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The hotkey %0:s conflicts with the hotkey selected for keyboard %1:s. If you continue, the hotkey for keyboard %1:s will be cleared. Continue?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Interface
string.comment: Hotkey Dialog/FormatString: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another interface hotkey [%0:s = Hotkey] (introduced 14.0.117)

resources.string: The hotkey %0:s conflicts with another hotkey. If you continue, the other hotkey will be cleared. Continue?

string.comment: Hints/PlainText: Hint - options tab button to reset hints (introduced 7.0.244.0)

string.name: SKHintsReset
string.comment: Hints/PlainText: Hint - options tab dialog confirming reset of hints (introduced 7.0.244.0)

resources.string: All hint messages have been reset and will be displayed again.

string.name: HintTitle_KH_EXITPRODUCT
string.comment: Hints/HintTitle: Hint - dialog title upon attempting to exit product (introduced 7.0.244.0)

string.name: Hint_KH_EXITPRODUCT
string.comment: Hints/Hint: Hint - asks for confirmation, explains the difference between de-activating a keyboard layout and closing Product (introduced 7.0.244.0)

resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit Keyman? Your Keyman keyboards will still be listed in the Windows languages, but will not be functional until you restart Keyman.

string.name: HintTitle_KH_CLOSEOSK
string.comment: Hints/HintTitle: Hint - dialog title upon closing the OSK (introduced 7.0.244.0)

string.name: Hint_KH_CLOSEOSK
string.comment: Hints/Hint: Hint - explains that Product is still running and iforms how to reopen OSK (introduced 7.0.244.0)

resources.string: You have closed the On Screen Keyboard. Keyman is still running. You can open the On Screen Keyboard at any time by clicking on the Keyman Icon and selecting \"On Screen Keyboard\"

string.name: S_HintDialog_DontShowHintAgain
string.comment: Hints/PlainText: Hint dialog - caption of checkbox at bottom of dialog (introduced 10.0.836.0)

string.name: S_HelpTitle
string.comment: Help Dialog/PlainText: Help - product name help (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Help_Product
string.comment: Help Dialog/PlainText: Help - help contents link title (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Help_Keyboard_Prefix
string.comment: Help Dialog/PlainText: Help - text preceding keyboard name (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Help_Keyboard_Suffix
string.comment: Help Dialog/PlainText: Help - text following keyboard name (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_ViewOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - View OSK pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_ViewKeyboardUsage
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - View Keyboard Usage pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_ViewFontHelper
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - View Font Helper pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_ViewCharacterMap
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - View Character Map pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_OpenConfiguration
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - Open Keyman Configuration pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_OpenHelp
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - Open help pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Toolbar_CloseOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Toolbar Context Help/PlainText: Toolbar help - Close OSK pop-up text (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_SwitchKeymanOff
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Switch Keyman Off [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_OnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - OSK [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_KeyboardUsage
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Keyboard Usage [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_FontHelper
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Font Helper [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_CharacterMap
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Character Map [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_TextEditor
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Text Editor [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_Configuration
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Configuration [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_Help
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Help [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_Menu_Exit
string.comment: System Tray Menu Items/PlainText: Systray item - Exit [& precedes alt + access-character] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_OSKContext_FadeWhenInactive
string.comment: On Screen Keyboard Menu Items/PlainText: OSK right-click menu - fade OSK when mouse is elsewhere (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_OSKContext_ShowToolbar
string.comment: On Screen Keyboard Menu Items/PlainText: OSK right-click menu - show/hide OSK toolbar (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_OSKContext_SaveAsWebPage
string.comment: On Screen Keyboard Menu Items/PlainText: OSK right-click menu - save diagram of active keyboard layout as a web page (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: S_OSKContext_Print
string.comment: On Screen Keyboard Menu Items/PlainText: OSK right-click menu - print diagram of active keyboard layout (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKApplicationTitle
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Product name used for the title of message boxes and message dialogs (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKSplashVersion
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Version number [%0:s = Version number string] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKButtonPrint
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Print button in Welcome dialog for keyboards (introduced 7.0.239.0)

string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed. [%0:s = Package to be uninstalled] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: A package with the name %0:s is already installed. Do you want to uninstall it and install the new one?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed. [%0:s = Keyboard name] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: A keyboard with the name \'%0:s\' is already installed. If you continue, it will be uninstalled before the new one is installed. Continue?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package [%0:s = Keyboard name, %1:s = Package name] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The keyboard \'%0:s\' is part of package \'%1:s\'. You must uninstall the entire package. Continue?

string.name: SKPackageDoesNotIncludeWelcome
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice of lack of introductory help [%0:s = Package Name] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The package or keyboard \'%0:s\' does not include any introductory help.

string.name: SKOSNotSupported
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice of unsupported operating system (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: This operating system is not supported.

string.name: SKOnlineHelpFile
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKCouldNotFindHelp
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice of help file not found (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The help file could not be found.

string.name: SKANSIEncoding
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKUnicodeEncoding
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Keyboard with a Unicode encoding (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKDownloadProgress_Title
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Notice of file downloading (introduced 7.0.230.0)

string.name: SKUninstallOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout [%0:s = Keyboard name] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: Are you sure you want to remove the on screen keyboard installed for %0:s?

string.name: SKUninstallKeyboard
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout [%0:s = Keyboard name] (introduced 7.0.239.0)

resources.string: Are you sure you want to uninstall keyboard %0:s?

string.name: SKUninstallPackage
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Request for confirmation to uninstall a package [%0:s = Package name, %1:s: Fonts list] (introduced 7.0.239.0)

resources.string:
Are you sure you want to uninstall package %0:s?
%1:s

string.name: SKUninstallPackageFonts
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall. [%0:s = Fonts list] (introduced 7.1.270.0)

resources.string: The following fonts will also be uninstalled: %0:s.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Request to build Unicode Character Map database (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The Character Map has a database of characters that needs to be built before it can be used. Build it now?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database [%0:s = Error detail string] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be deleted for a rebuild. Error details are: %0:s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Error creating Unicode Character Map database [%0:s = Error details] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The Unicode Character database could not be created and has been disabled. Error details are: %0:s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild. [%0:s = Error message] (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string: The Unicode character database did not load successfully (%0:s). Rebuild it now?

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found [%0:s: error message] (introduced 7.0.241.0)

resources.string:
Keyman failed to start. Please check your security settings to make sure that the program keyman.exe is allowed to start before continuing. The error returned was:
\"%0:s\"
Do you want to try and start Keyman again now?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Formatted Messages/FormatString: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab (introduced 7.0.230.0)

resources.string:
Keyman debug information will be stored in a log file called %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (where # is a number). You should exit Keyman before attempting to delete this file.
WARNING: This file can grow large very quickly. Enabling debugging may slow down your system and should only be done if advised by technical support.
PRIVACY WARNING: Please note that the debug logfile records all keystrokes that you type. You should only turn on the debug log for the duration of a debugging or diagnostic session.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_PleaseWait
string.comment: OSK Font Helper/FormatString: OSK Font helper message (introduced 8.0.294.0)

resources.string: Please wait while searching for releted fonts for keyboard %0:s

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NonUnicode
string.comment: OSK Font Helper/FormatString: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard (introduced 8.0.294.0)

resources.string: Keyboard %0:s is not a Unicode keyboard. Fonts cannot be automatically located. Please check the keyboard documentation for font information.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NoKeyboards
string.comment: OSK Font Helper/FormatString: OSK Font helper no keyboards (introduced 8.0.294.0)

resources.string: No keyboard layouts are currently installed or loaded.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_ChooseKeyboard
string.comment: OSK Font Helper/FormatString: OSK Font helper choose keyboard (introduced 8.0.294.0)

resources.string: Please select a Keyman keyboard to find related fonts.

string.name: SKTextEditorCaption
string.comment: Text Editor/FormatString: Caption of Text Editor (introduced 10.0.836.0)
